channel.title: Opengrok on LuyangのBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Opengrok on LuyangのBlog

item.title: opengrok
item.description: 环境 ubuntu 18.04 x64 依赖工具 jdk 1.8 universal-ctags tomcat8 opengrok 配置流程 jdk 安装 sudo apt install openjdk-8-jdk openjdk-8-jdk-headless openjdk-8-jre openjdk-8-jre-dcevm openjdk-8-jre-headless 通常android编译环境能够正常工作jdk环境已经ok. $ java -version openjdk version "1.8.0_252" OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_252-8u252-b09-1~18.04-b09) OpenJDK
